extendedInfo.description: âª Ringtone Maker Pro âª"Fade In/Out" and "File Volume" are well supported for MP3!Don't pay for any ringtone any more! Ringtone Maker Pro is the app you want, to make unlimited ringtones, notification/SMS tones, and alarm tones using songs On your device. Simply select a song, swipe the audio wave, select a short clip, and create your ringtone. It's so easy! Get started creating your own tones with your favorite songs---------------------------------FEATURESâ Copy, cut paste and previewâ MP3, WAV, AAC/M4A, AMR files in SD card.â Fade In/Out for MP3.â Adjust file volume for MP3.â Record a new audio clip to edit.â Search ringtone by quick scrolling or typing.â Show edited ringtones in History.â Preview demo before saving.â Set as Ringtone/ Notification/ Alarm.â Set ringtone for one or more contacts.â Assign ringtone to one or more contacts.---------------------------------FAQ1.Q: Why can't I find my songs in Ringtone Maker Pro?   A: Please make sure your SD card mounted correctly and you have audios in your SD card. If your audio still won't show, use "Menu"->"Refresh List", the device's Media scanner then will find songs for you. But it depends on your device and it may take time.2. Q:  Where does the app save my edited ringtones?    A:  In /sdcard/media/audio/ringtones3. Q: What are the best durations for ringtone, notification and alarm?    A: For ringtone, 30s would be best.         For notification, 6s would be best.        For alarm, well, no duration is best for everybody, but longer is better.---------------------------------PERMISSIONS:1. WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: to store your editted tones.2. READ_CONTACTS, WRITE_CONTACTS: to set tones for contacts3. WRITE_SETTINGS: to set default tones4. GET_ACCOUNTS: to contact with you when you feedback5. INTERNET, READ_PHONE_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: to get ad.---------------------------------Ringdroid code: http://code.google.com/p/ringdroid/Apache License, Version 2.0: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

reviews.title: needs more than 5 stars!!!!!!
reviews.comment: had two other ringtone apps dwnloaded this does exactly what says..easy to use..and so far no ads everytime i create a ringtone like arcitech did..

reviews.title: Best Ringtone Maker app Available!
reviews.comment: This is perfect! It\'s beyond user friendly, no glitches, and does everything it said it would and even more importantly what I needed from a ringtone maker. Thank you so much perfectionholic!

reviews.title: Won\'t search for songs
reviews.comment: This was a good app until for some reason it stopped letting me search for songs. Please fix
reviews.author: Joshua Fowler

reviews.comment: I love how you can set any length you want and can adjust it as the songs still playing. And the fact that it allows you to set the ringtone at the time of saving, is so convienient.

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Had this app for just over 2 months and it stopped working.won\'t look up to find anything.was 5 stars until this, please fix whatever happened!

reviews.comment: It won\'t even look up or find the simplest of titles after the first month after installing. Waste of my time.

reviews.title: The best one out there!
reviews.comment: Making a ringtone looks great and pretty darn fast and accurate than the others I found out there. Strongly recommended!
